column1: #Text=Israel announces ceasefire in Gaza Strip ; rocket fire into Israel continues
#Text=The remains of a bombed orphanage and a mosque in Gaza

#Text=Yesterday Israeli Prime Minister Ehud Olmert held a press conference to announce that Israel would observe a unilateral ceasefire in their offensive in the Gaza Strip , but that Israeli troops would remain in Gaza .
#Text=The ceasefire began at 2:00 a.m. local time in Gaza .
#Text=Olmert stated that he understands Hamas does not agree to the ceasefire .

#Text=He also stated that in order for the Israeli to withdraw from Gaza , Hamas " must stop firing rockets " into Israel , but that excessive rocket fire would cause the Israel Defense Forces to " respond with force " .
#Text=" At two o'clock in the morning ( 0000 GMT ) we will stop fire but we will continue to be deployed in Gaza and its surroundings .

#Text=This comes just four hours after Olmert said that  the factories in which its missiles were manufactured have been destroyed " along with " smuggling routes , through dozens of tunnels , have been bombed " .

column1: #Text=Hamas issued a statement following the press conference saying the ceasefire is not enough and that their resistance will continue .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=The occupier must halt his fire immediately and withdraw from our land and lift his blockade and open all crossings and we will not accept any one Zionist soldier on our land , regardless of the price that it costs ,  said Fawzi Barhoum , a Hamas spokesman .
